enumeratedValue.name: 0b1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Cache data references

enumeratedValue.name: 0b000
enumeratedValue.description: LRU replacement algorithm per set across all four ways

enumeratedValue.name: 0b001
enumeratedValue.description: Reserved

enumeratedValue.name: 0b010
enumeratedValue.description: Independent LRU with ways [0-1] for ifetches, [2-3] for data

enumeratedValue.name: 0b011
enumeratedValue.description: Independent LRU with ways [0-2] for ifetches, [3] for data

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1xx
enumeratedValue.description: Reserved

enumeratedValue.name: 0b00
enumeratedValue.description: 32 bits

enumeratedValue.name: 0b01
enumeratedValue.description: 64 bits

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1x
enumeratedValue.description: Reserved

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Speculation buffer and single entry buffer are not affected

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Invalidate (clear) speculation buffer and single entry buffer

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: No cache way invalidation for the corresponding cache

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Invalidate cache way for the corresponding cache: clear the tag, data, and vld bits of ways selected

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Cache way is unlocked and may be displaced

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Cache way is locked and its contents are not displaced

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Single entry buffer is disabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Single entry buffer is enabled

enumeratedValue.description: Do not prefetch in response to instruction fetches

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Enable prefetches in response to instruction fetches

enumeratedValue.description: Do not prefetch in response to data references

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
